text: Gergely Kulcsár (10 March 1934 - 12 August 2020) a Hungarian javelin thrower. He competed at the 1960, 1964, 1968 and 1972 Olympics and won two bronze medals, in 1960 and 1968, and a silver medal in 1964. He was the Olympic flag bearer for Hungary in 1964, 1968 and 1972. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hungarian athletes Category:Javelin throwers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary
title: Gergely Kulcsár
